column4: Is there any easy way to create filters on Thunderbird (like on Evolution and KMail: right click->filter on->from, or mailing list, or...) ?
or right-click on any address -> create filter from message...
can't it create filters on mailing list ?
what do you mean by that?
it can create filters based on a lot of conditions
I don't know what a List-Id is but I'm sure TB knows about it
I usually filter my mailing lists by labels in the subject
on Kmail or Evolution it is: Right click->Filter on->Mailing list.
that is too unreliable, there's a List-Id header put by most mailing list engines to do filtering.
with TB, you can filter on anything that's part of the mail header
I suppose that label-id is within the header
I know, but the way to create filters for List-Id is like a 10 steps operation... to much for the amount of mailing lists I have.
it's probably more like 5 steps and there're tons of TB extensions. One might ease the procedure you seek
